titleStmt.title: A fresh whip for all scandalous lyers· Or, A true description of the tvvo eminent pamphliteers, or squib-tellers of this kingdome. VVith a plaine and true relation of their tricks and devices wherewith they use to couzen and cheate the common-wealth.

notesStmt.note: The two eminent pamphliteers = the "Diurnall-Writer" and the "Perfect Occurrence Writer".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
